marklogic.body:
.
Mr Hannan addresses the European Parliament.
Freeze frame this video at 1.13 minutes of Mr Hannan addressing the European Parliament, which he posted https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b7tEGncepBM
Can you Spot Mr Hannan? This is what it is to be isolated in Europe.
Britain cannot cut itself Off from the continent and hang on to the coat tails of America. It is this policy which has lead to the electoral disaster for established British politics in Bradford West.
At 3% of the vote no one gives a damn about euroscepticism.
.
